message: I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more for being the better negotiator!
You think you're a better negotiator? Prove it!
I'll give you 3500, but I'm not going to let you get the better of me! I'll make sure I get more in the end.
You're trying to bully me? Bring it on!
I'll give you 3000, but I'm not going to back down. I'm going to get a better deal or nothing at all!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll give you 2500, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'm not going to settle for this. I'll give you 2000, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. This is my last offer.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to negotiate further.
I've had enough of your games, Alice. I'm taking 1000 and walking away. I'm not going to give you a single penny more.
